author: Al Jazeera
title: Poll: Most Americans favour lockdowns to curb coronavirus
description: Only 12 percent of Americans say the measures go too far, and about 26 percent believe the limits do not go far enough.
content: Despite pockets of attention-grabbing protests, a new survey finds Americans remain overwhelmingly in favour of stay-at-home orders and other efforts to slow the spread of the coronavirus. A majority say it will not be safe to lift such restrictions anytime s… [+4599 chars]
